actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain rights in the State of South Carolina.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to convey to the record owner of the land described in this Act all right, title, and interest in minerals reserved to the United States in such land in the State of South Carolina.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain rights in the State of South Carolina.
